name: UpdateAssessmentStatus
description:
Update the status of a candidate assessment in Ashby.

Use this tool to update the status of a started assessment in Ashby. Requires 'candidatesWrite' permission. Provide 'assessment_status' unless 'cancelled_reason' is given.

parameters.name: assessment_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details such as 'assessment_id', 'timestamp', 'assessment_status', 'assessment_profile_url', and optionally, 'assessment_result', 'cancelled_reason', and 'metadata'.

metadata.description: Any other metadata about the assessment (e.g. ETA until complete). All assessment data should have unique identifiers.
Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
Any other metadata about the assessment (e.g. ETA until complete). All assessment data should have unique identifiers.
